sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The Writ of quo warranto served upon the Lord Mayor, commonalty, and citizens of London to inquire by what authority they use and lay claim to their liberties, privledges, and franchises. Sawyer, Robert, Sir, 1633-1692.
2 p.
Printed for W. Davies ..., London : 1682.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. Robert Sawyer was Attorney General from 1681 to 1687. Broadside. Latin declaration followed by English translation on p. 2. Imprint taken from colophon. Attributed to W. Davis by Wing.
=======

Printed for W. Davies ..., London : 1682.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. Robert Sawyer was Attorney General from 1681 to 1687. Broadside. Latin declaration followed by English translation on p. 2. Imprint taken from colophon. Attributed to W. Davis by Wing.
